thread.title: Barry Roche
thread.title_full: Optical Express Augen Lasern bewertet von Barry Roche

author: Barry Roche
title: Barry Roche
text: had the operation yesterday in the berlin Friedrichstrasse clinic and today my vision is excellent and i have no discomfort. The staff were kind, helpful and professional. I have only good things to report about the treatment i received from optical express
